Title: Relates to welfare, medical, and retirement plans provided by a horsemen's organization in the absence of contractual obligations
Summary: Relates to welfare, medical, and retirement plans provided by a horsemen's organization in the absence of contractual obligations; provides that in the absence of a contract between the licensed harness racing corporation or association and the representative horsemen's organization, the previous contract shall be automatically extended for a one-time period of twelve months commencing from the date that the previously negotiated contract expired.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
LawCode: Amd ยง318, RWB L (as proposed in S.2612-B & A.8206)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to welfare, medical, and retirement plans provided by a horsemen's organization in the absence of contractual obligations
